name: Damno
description:
This game is for 1 or 2 players offline.

Try to score by helping your dots to the other side or by making (multiple) 4 in a row.

There are 6 bot levels: 3 for horizontal play and 3 for orthagonal play.

Options: Start at level 1 (battle against Birwinlesso), level 2 (Birwinmoro) or level 3 (both) for 1 player, timelimited turns or not, 4 in a row active or not, (semi)blind 4 in a row or not.

For 2 players: use 1 or 2 mouses at 1 PC. Local LAN not supported.
